Playing hero gallery, press to pause images slides
BOOK YOUR HOLIDAY PARTIES WITH US!
Located lakeside in Port Canaveral’s COVE restaurant district, RISING TIDE tap & table offers breathtaking views of the iconic Exploration Tower and provides a special place for your private and social events.
You can reserve one of our large community tables, an entire section of our island bar, waterside deck, or interior dining rooms, or even book the privacy of our exclusive “Barrel Room”. Take advantage of our customizable menu of hand-crafted food options that earn high praise from locals and world travelers alike.
We're here to host your next large group lunch, corporate gathering, office happy hour, birthday celebration, or rehearsal dinner.
For additional information, please call (321) 576-0676 or email
parties@risingtidetap.com
.
Click below to download our banquet guide and INQUIRE TODAY!
Banquet Guide
(opens in a new tab)
Inquire Now
The Barrel Room
A unique private space with a curved barrel-shaped ceiling, the Barrel Room is a perfect indoor setting configurable for buffet, fine dinners, receptions and corporate meetings.
Capacity:
Seated Events 60/ Reception 75
The Show Room
A semi-private area with restaurant energy provided by the large windowed, display kitchen.   With large, movable plank tables – perfect for large, casual seated gatherings.
Capacity:
Seated Events 64
The West Bar
The WEST BAR provides a more lively experience with high ceilings and operable garage doors that open to the outdoor deck With a huge island bar – this area is perfect for receptions, cocktail parties, and beer and wine sampling events.
Capacity:
Receptions/Cocktail Parties 70
The West Deck
Outdoor dining at its finest, the West Deck provides beautiful, waterside sunsets – perfect for mid-size social gatherings to larger receptions.  Tent/Covering, live music, outdoor cooking and other options available on request.
Capacity:
Seated/Reception Events 125
Inquire Now
Private Events
